meanings.definition: Resembling a gem in brilliance or beauty.
meanings.sent1: The gemmy necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her gemmy eyes shone with happiness.
meanings.sent3: The gemmy ring was so bright, it almost blinded me!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as gemmy as a precious jewel.
meanings.sent5: The gemmy stars lit up the night sky like diamonds.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities of a gem.
meanings.sent1: The gemmy stone was smooth and flawless.
meanings.sent2: The gemmy vase was delicate and exquisite.
meanings.sent3: He felt like a gemmy prince in his royal attire.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as gemmy as a rare gemstone.
meanings.sent5: The gemmy fabric felt luxurious against her skin.

meanings.sent1: The gemmy flowers in the garden attracted butterflies.
meanings.sent2: The gemmy sequins on her dress caught the light.
meanings.sent3: The gemmy disco ball made the room feel like a party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as gemmy as a stream of sparkling water.
meanings.sent5: The gemmy rainbow painted the sky with vibrant colors.
